traits.Amphibious: The sea elf can breathe air and water.
traits.Fey Ancestry: The sea elf has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the sea elf to sleep.

actions.Spear: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2+1d4 + 0 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage, or 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.
